lines: Ilanga li yashona, Izulu li yasitha
Linda u zukhuleke, Nxa ukukhanya kuthe Kwafiphala!
Umhlaba nezulu le, Ku yabonga uBaba uSomandla
Si buthe si yadinga, Umbuso wokulinga Oseduze!
Ukuhlwa ku sondele, Ngomsa si haukele
Ubuso nobukhosi, Ku sithwe zinkanyezi U yiNgcwele!
Nazo izingelosi, Zi tusa ubukhosi Bu ka Jesu
